name: Guardian of the Heavens
description:
You are the protector of the gates of heaven. You are tasked to stop all the little devils from getting to the gates Assets used:
  • Music from Rapidpunches over on OpenGameArt.org
  • Sky box from Unity Asset store Fantasy Skybox Free Click here to download 
  • Link to source code Click Here
Controls:
  • Using WASD keys to move
  • Use mouse left click or spacebar to shoot
Objective:
  • Avoid being shot 
  • Kill enemies for points
